001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config;
002
003import lombok.Builder;
004import lombok.Getter;
005import lombok.Setter;
006
007/**
008 * Represents the configuration settings for database connections.
009 *
010 * <p>This class holds essential details such as the database type, host, port,
011 * credentials, and database name required to establish a connection.
012 *
013 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
014 */
015@Getter
016@Builder
017@Setter
018public class DatabaseConfiguration {
019
020   /**
021    * The type of database (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, h2).
022    */
023   private DbType<?> dbType;
024
025   /**
026    * The hostname or IP address of the database server.
027    */
028   private String host;
029
030   /**
031    * The port number used for database connections.
032    */
033   private Integer port;
034
035   /**
036    * The name of the database.
037    */
038   private String database;
039
040   /**
041    * The username for authenticating the database connection.
042    */
043   private String dbUser;
044
045   /**
046    * The password for authenticating the database connection.
047    */
048   private String dbPassword;
049
050   /**
051    * If set, this full JDBC URL will be used as the cache key instead
052    * of the host/port/database combination.
053    */
054   private String fullConnectionString;
055
056   /**
057    * Builds a unique key from protocol, host, port and database name.
058    * Used when {@link #fullConnectionString} is null.
059    *
060    * @return A string of the form "protocol://host:port/database"
061    */
062   public String buildUrlKey() {
063      return String.format("%s://%s:%d/%s",
064            dbType.protocol(),
065            host,
066            port,
067            database);
068   }
069}
